title: Good condensed fonts
content:
I need some help finding good new and usefull condensed fonts.  
I am a book-cover designer and space economy is often important in my trade.  
I´ve been using DIN Engschrift and Trade Gothic Condensed for a looong time now, and I feel it´s time to update my fontlibrary.  
I like Tungsten, but has it been any more good releases in the last ten years?

And it must include lowercases.

grateful for any suggestion

/patlin
author: patlin
